reviews.name: Repo! The Genetic Opera (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: This movie was simply fantastic in my opinion. Why Lionsgate did not do a full release of the film to theaters is beyond me, but it is a great movie. It is so different from the other types of musicals we seen made into films. I will say though for people not into rock music and dont like blood and a bit of gore, then this is not really for you.
reviews.title: A amazing and new type of Musical!

reviews.name: Repo! The Genetic Opera (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: This movie is full of catchy tunes and great character personalites! You really get pulled into the world of REPO! and feel like your there. It is more than a movie, it is an experience! The songs won't ever leave your head after watching this. Pure genius!
reviews.title: BEST MOVIE: HANDS DOWN!

reviews.name: Repo! The Genetic Opera (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Repo! on blu ray is chock-full of the goods. Great picture, great sound and awesome music! Tons of special features make this rock opera a fantastic grab.
reviews.title: My heart has been repossesed.

reviews.name: Repo! The Genetic Opera (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: This Rock Opera is AMAZING! I love it, and have shared it with many friends and family, a vast majority of whom loved it as well. Saw it originally streamed over the internet, and had to have the Blu-Ray.
reviews.title: Cult Phenomenon

reviews.name: Repo! The Genetic Opera (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText:
Incredible, totally 'over the top' rock opera experience. Paul Sorvino and Sarah Brightman were fantastic as one would expect from their reputations and Alexa Vega made quite a splash. I gotta tell ya though, Anthony Stewart Head kicked butt and took names. Outstanding performance, Mr Head, bravo!
The only con I can think of is that now I have the song 'Zydrate Anatomy' stuck in my head, can't get rid of it!
Good picture quality, a little soft, but I believe it looks exactly as the director intended. Plenty of extras and I love the 'sing alongs'.
If you're thinking of watching this on your computer, stop right now. Get yourself over to a friend's who has a big TV and nice sound system and crank it up. This movie NEEDS to be big and loud otherwise you simply have not seen it properly.
reviews.title: Excellent movie, a cult classic.
